metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7970 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The pivot_root implementation in fs/namespace.c in the Linux kernel through3.17 does not properly interact with certain locations of a chrootdirectory, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(mount-tree loop) via . (dot) values in both arguments to the pivot_rootsystem call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
